Vikramshila
About
Vikramshila is another academic building in the Srinivasa Ramanujan Complex, having four lecture halls, several seminar rooms, and Kalidas Auditorium,which has a seating capacity of 850.

title: Vikramshila
text: Vikramshila is another academic building in the S. R. Complex, having four lecture halls, several seminar rooms, and Kalidas Auditorium . The School of Medical Science and Technology is housed in the basement of the Vikramshila building. Most of classes in Vikramshila are held for first year undergraduates. Many introductory seminars on Societies and clubs are held in Vikramshila.

title: Extra-Curricular Activities
text:
Vikramshila Foyer
Vikramshila is the hub of extra curricular activities. Technology Dance Society have their dance sessions in Vikramshila, Technology Robotix Society also keeps their KRAIG classes mainly in Vikramshila. Technology Dramatics Society also have their dramatics sessions in Vikramshila. It is also the Robotix Avenue during Kshitij . All the Robotics related events in Kshitij are held here.
